overview: This video provides basic instruction in how to work with sheet metal for the purpose of building a metal kit aircraft. An experienced instructor covers the terminology, tools, and techniques required to build a kitplane. You can learn those sheet metal skills at your own pace, including topics such as aluminum basics, fasteners, layout and assembly, tools, drilling, dimpling, countersinking, deburring, riveting, and many others.
tagline: Learn the basics of sheet metal application needed to build the kitplane of your dreams.
title: Sheet Metal for Kit Aircraft
